title: Redemption is never going to get nerfed just get use to the bullshit
body: Meddler mains Janna and he wants more ways to cheese the game.

replies.body:
Main answer: We don't balance around what Rioter's play. If Redemption's too strong, we'll nerf it. Suspect it is, though not to the degree it stands out relative to other things that are further out of line (e.g. Courage of the Colossus or Twitch). 

Secondary answer: Come on, if you're going to try for a personal argument at least get your fact's right. Janna's my tenth most played champ this year, with a whopping 4 games. Conspiracy theories tend to work better with a more relevant starting point, been quite a while since I've been on a Janna kick.
Yeah, get it right. He's a filthy Brand main!

Hey friend, any opinions on this: 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/9KRtKB33-opinion-champion-design-is-being-limited-by-forcing-them-to-fit-into-existing-classes 

Blizzard is kicking your (team's) ass in terms of pushing the limits with creative champions and mechanics. Any opinions on creating unique/ innovative mechanics or champs like in Heroes? (ie Abathur, Cho, murky)

Blizzard doesn't have the same design restrictions as League does because League has a lot more shit to deal with.

Runes.

Masteries.

Item Sets.

HotS doesn't have nearly the same amount of parameters by which a champion can become overloaded through factors outside of kit choices, so it's easier to make random ass shit and then balance it as needed.
